meanings.definition: People who lived after the biblical flood.
meanings.sent1: The postdiluvians rebuilt their homes after the great flood.
meanings.sent2: Many postdiluvians believed in the story of Noah's ark.
meanings.sent3: The postdiluvians organized a boat race for fun.
meanings.sent4: In the postdiluvian era, new civilizations emerged from the ruins.
meanings.sent5: The postdiluvians' resilience in the face of disaster was admirable.

meanings.definition: Relating to the period after the biblical flood.
meanings.sent1: The postdiluvians artifacts were found in the archaeological dig.
meanings.sent2: The postdiluvians landscape showed signs of the ancient flood.
meanings.sent3: The postdiluvians-themed party decorations were a hit.
meanings.sent4: The postdiluvians era marked a new beginning for humanity.
meanings.sent5: The postdiluvians art depicted scenes of the great flood.
